languages.text: "Вашими заботами — намного лучше! Голодает и болеет теперь вдвое меньше народа, чем раньше. Благослови вас Император за проявленное милосердие".
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
languages.original_text: "Вашими заботами — намного лучше! Голодает и болеет теперь вдвое меньше народа, чем раньше. Благослови вас Император за проявленное милосердие".

traits.locale_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! The hunger and diseases seem to be receding. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! The hunger and diseases seem to be receding. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! The hunger and diseases seem to be receding. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! The hunger and diseases seem to be receding. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! The hunger and diseases seem to be receding. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
"Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

languages.text: "Viel besser und wir wissen Eure Sorge zu schätzen! Wir haben dieser Tage nur halb so viele Kranke und Hungrige. Möge Euch der Imperator für die Gnade segnen, die Ihr uns gewährt habt."
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

traits.locale_text: "Viel besser und wir wissen Eure Sorge zu schätzen! Wir haben dieser Tage nur halb so viele Kranke und Hungrige. Möge Euch der Imperator für die Gnade segnen, die Ihr uns gewährt habt."

languages.text: « Notre situation s'est grandement améliorée. Et nous vous en sommes reconnaissants. Les cas de malnutrition et de maladie ont été réduits de moitié. Que l'Empereur vous bénisse pour la générosité dont vous faites preuve à notre égard. »
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

traits.locale_text: « Notre situation s'est grandement améliorée. Et nous vous en sommes reconnaissants. Les cas de malnutrition et de maladie ont été réduits de moitié. Que l'Empereur vous bénisse pour la générosité dont vous faites preuve à notre égard. »

languages.text: «¡Mucho mejor, y le agradecemos mucho su atención! Ahora tenemos la mitad de hambrientos y enfermos. Que el Emperador le bendiga por la misericordia que nos ha mostrado».
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mucho mejor, y le agradecemos mucho su atención! Ahora tenemos la mitad de hambrientos y enfermos. Que el Emperador le bendiga por la misericordia que nos ha mostrado».

languages.text: 「だいぶ良くなりました。お心づかいに感謝しています！飢えや病も半分に減ったようです。あなたが我らに見せてくださった慈悲に対し、皇帝のご加護がありますように」
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

traits.locale_text: 「だいぶ良くなりました。お心づかいに感謝しています！飢えや病も半分に減ったようです。あなたが我らに見せてくださった慈悲に対し、皇帝のご加護がありますように」

languages.text: “比之前好多了，我们非常感谢您的仁慈！现在生病和饿肚子的人只有以前的一半了。感谢您如此仁慈地对待我们，愿帝皇保佑您。”
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."

traits.locale_text: “比之前好多了，我们非常感谢您的仁慈！现在生病和饿肚子的人只有以前的一半了。感谢您如此仁慈地对待我们，愿帝皇保佑您。”

languages.text: "Çok daha iyi. İlginiz için de ayrıca müteşekkiriz! Bugünlerde aç ve hasta sayımız yarıya indi. İmparator, bize gösterdiğiniz merhamet için sizi kutsasın."
languages.original_text: "Much better, and we appreciate your care! We have half as many hungry and sick these days. May the Emperor bless you for the mercy you've shown us."
